TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant , Mr PERSON GPE , is a NORP national who was born in DATE .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant had trouble urinating and was diagnosed with prostatitis . He was told that he needed surgery ; however it was not possible to perform it in pre - trial detention . On DATE an X - ray revealed a triple contracture of this wrist , and the applicant received treatment in the prison hospital , but the wrist mobility could not be restored .

CARDINAL . The Government submitted the applicant ’s medical records from IZCARDINAL/CARDINAL and his current place of imprisonment .

CARDINAL . On admission to the GPE remand prison following his arrest on DATE , the applicant underwent a comprehensive examination . He did not make any complaints concerning his health .
